body.name: BELLA 8 Qt Digital Air Fryer with TurboCrisp Technology, Large Family Size Nonstick Cooking Basket and Crisping Tray, Multiple Preset Functions, Auto Shutoff, Stainless Steel, 1750 Watt
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 5 hrs 6 mins
features: FAMILY FEAST MASTER: Embrace culinary versatility and unleash your inner chef with Bella's air fryers. With the large 6.6 lb capacity, you can prep unforgettable dinners for the whole family and turn every gathering into a delightful feast

TURBOCRISP WONDER: Thanks to the innovative TurboCrisp Technology, this beautiful double air fryer guarantees uniformly crispy results, transforming your dishes into golden, crunchy masterpieces, a taste of juicy perfection in every bite

DIGITAL DELIGHT: This large air fryer features an easy-to-read touchscreen with multiple preset options and fully adjustable temperature. With a range from 90°F to 400°F you can personalize your food and always be in control of the cooking time

RAPID RELEASE MARVEL: Say goodbye to stressful dinners. The RapidRelease, Non-Stick Coating of the air fryer oven liberates the cooking pot and crisping tray, so you can focus more on enjoying your food and less on cleaning

HEATING POWERHOUSE: Gift greatness to your friends. The 1750 watt heating system ensures quick preheating, making the stainless steel air fryer a superb housewarming gift or an ideal addition to any wedding registry. Heat up the joy in every kitchen
body.description: Welcome to a new era of culinary delight! Bella's countertop air fryer is a kitchen essential, blending innovation and practicality seamlessly. With a capacious 6.6 lb capacity, it's the epitome of versatility, turning family meals into memorable feasts. Experience the magic of TurboCrisp Technology, ensuring every dish emerges uniformly crispy and golden.Navigate your culinary adventures effortlessly with the digital hub featuring presets and a temperature range from 90°F to 400°F. Transform ordinary recipes into culinary masterpieces with ease. The RapidRelease Non-Stick Coating makes cleanup a breeze, liberating the cooking pot, crisping tray, and basket divider effortlessly.Powered by a robust 1750-watt heating system, this non toxic, beautiful air fryer isn't just a kitchen appliance; it's a gift of efficiency and joy. Perfect for housewarmings or as a registry addition, it brings speed, power, and a touch of magic to kitchens. Elevate your cooking journey and savor the delights of convenience and innovation now!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Air Fryer
reviews.reviewText: Great size. I got this to replace our air fryer that was a bit smaller and stopped working after about 5 years. I'm happy with it. I like the square shape, and it's easy to use and french fries come out crispy. The tray that holds food up from the bottom of the drawer is a bit fiddly and doesn't slide in/out easily, especially when it's hot, but that's a small complaint. I didn't notice any odors (other than the food) when using. The tray and drawer wash easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've heard so many wonderful things about air fryers, so I decided to try this one out, and I'm so glad I did!Right out of the gate, it's beautiful and looks like a million bucks sitting on the counter, and looks like it was made to go with all of my stainless appliances. It feels solid and well-made, is so easy to use, and clean up is a snap. According to friends who own air fryers, it's a large size and holds more than most. I haven't had it long enough to try many things, but it crisps sweet potato fries to perfection. So far, I haven't found one negative; everything about this lovely thing is great, and I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great size, works great and easy to clean

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Terrifying noises and broken half the time
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Horrible junk. Just got this air fryer and tried it out. The fan, when it works, makes noise like an 1800's dynamo starting up. I seriously thought the machine was about to explode because of how insanely loud it is under "normal" operating conditions. But it does go quiet all the time, because the fan breaks all the time. Within the first attempt of using it, I'm watching a box heat up with no air convection at all and didn't realize it was only cooking itself rather than the food. But after a while it's easy to know if the fan is working correctly, because you'll hear the sounds of a machine shop in your kitchen and half to bash the unit on the side to get the fan motor to start. Think of a really ancient piece of machinery and you'll understand this thing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This air fryer is a life saver! It works better than any other air fryer I’ve had in the past. No matter what we’re cooking, it always comes out perfectly cooked and beats our expectations. I also love the size of it. We never have to worry that our food won’t fit and it makes sure everyone is fed. It’s also a very good looking machine that I don’t mind leaving out on the counter. 10/10 you won’t be disappointed with this air fryer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fragile guide fins for the basket.
reviews.reviewText: Either in shipping or unpacking, the small plastic fins that guide the basket in broke. The 8 quart capacity is nice and fries browned well. It took 3 minutes of preheating before the cycle starts. Lots of time & temperature options but wish there was more information in the user's guide on when to use or not use the crisper tray.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Feeds a family
reviews.reviewText: This large sized air fryer is great for a family. It has quite a few features to help with just about anything you'd like to cook. Easy to use and clean. Better than frying in oil!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this air fryer! Works great, easy to use, and leaves your food looking and tasting good! Makes the perfect roasted vegetables!!
